item.title: All Roblox Steal a Fish Codes & Rewards—Every August 2025 Active Code
item.content:encoded:
Steal a Fish is a Roblox game where you use theft to build an aquarium. Here’s everything you need to know about the game’s reward codes.

Steal a Fish is a Roblox game that lets the player engage in heists to steal scaly aquatic creatures from under the noses of others. It’s absolutely hilarious, and like many other games in Roblox, reward codes are bound to arrive sooner or later.

Here’s everything we know so far.

Are There Any Active Steal a Fish Yet? (August 2025)

As of August 2025, there are no active Roblox Steal a Fish codes.

However, this likely won’t be for long, as Roblox games add new codes all the time, so check back soon to see if any have been added.

How to Redeem Roblox Steal a Fish Codes

To redeem codes in Roblox Steal a Fish, follow the steps below:

  1. Launch Roblox and then the Steal a Fish game.
  2. Click on the ‘Codes’ option.
  3. Type in the code you want and press Enter.

If the code is still live, you’ll then receive the above reward. Don’t forget that every code can only be used once per player account.

Are There Any Expired Steal a Fish Codes?

As no codes have been added to Steal a Fish so none have expired yet.

This is where we’ll keep a log of expired codes when we have some.

Where to Find New Roblox Steal a Fish Codes

If you want to always know what the current reward codes are, then make sure you bookmark this page. That’s because we’ll update it regularly and will be sure to keep it up to date, that is, once some codes arrive.

Are you a big fan of Roblox “Steal A” games? Then be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can start up some new light-fingered discussions.

While you’re getting stuck into Roblox, check out our code guides for other games, such as Steal an Anime, Steal a Brainrot, and Steal a Star Wars.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
